tweet.text: Is your interest in history rivaled only by your grammatical prowess? Do you delight in em and en dashes? Apply to the Presidential Management Fellows Program to work in Editing and Publishing at @HistoryAtState #PMF applications open Sept. 28 to Oct. 12: https://t.co/9MdLicfclR https://t.co/Nw8lejhYzs
